krpano.title: ebrochure

hotspot.name: pop-up-one-normal
hotspot.onclick: dsable-info(); move-out-ui(); set(layer[pin-one-normal].visible, true); delayedcall(0.35, set(layer[slide-menu].visible, true); tween(layer[slide-menu].alpha, 1, 0.35, default););
hotspot.onclick.mobile: dsable-info(); move-out-ui(); set(layer[pin-one-mobile].visible, true); delayedcall(0.35, set(layer[popup-menu].visible, true); tween(layer[popup-menu].alpha, 1, 0.35, default););
